title: Frontend Developer Intern
shortDescription: Join our frontend team to build amazing user interfaces.
description:
This is a 3-month remote internship. You will be working with our core frontend team on developing new features for our flagship product. 

Responsibilities:
- Collaborate with designers and backend developers to implement new UI features.
- Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code using React and Tailwind CSS.
- Participate in code reviews and contribute to our growing component library.
- Troubleshoot and debug issues to ensure a smooth user experience.

Qualifications:
- Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
- Experience with React.js.
- Familiarity with state management libraries (e.g., Redux, Zustand) is a plus.
- Basic understanding of REST APIs.

Additional Information:
- Duration: 3 months with potential for extension based on performance.
- Stipend: Competitive with a completion certificate.
- Tools: You will work with GitHub, Figma, and JIRA for project tracking.
- Mentorship: Regular sessions with senior frontend developers.
eligibility: Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science or a related field.

title: Data Analyst Intern
shortDescription: Analyze large datasets and generate valuable insights.
description:
Data Insights Co. is looking for a motivated Data Analyst Intern to join our team in New York. You will work on real-world business problems and assist our data science team in making data-driven decisions.

Responsibilities:
- Assist in data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing from various sources.
- Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends and patterns.
- Create dashboards and visualizations to communicate findings to stakeholders.
- Collaborate with the team on larger data science projects.

Qualifications:
- Proficient in Python and its data analysis libraries (Pandas, NumPy).
- Strong knowledge of SQL for data querying.
- Experience with data visualization tools like Matplotlib, Seaborn, or Tableau.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.

Additional Information:
- Duration: 6 months full-time in New York office.
- Exposure: Work on real datasets from finance and retail sectors.
- Tools: Tableau, Power BI, and Google Data Studio.
- Opportunity: High-performing interns may receive full-time offers.
eligibility: Final year students with good analytical skills.

title: Backend Engineer Intern
shortDescription: Work on our scalable backend services.
description:
As a Backend Engineer Intern at Server Systems LLC, you will have the opportunity to work on the core infrastructure that powers our services. This is a unique chance to gain hands-on experience with scalable systems and cloud technologies.

What You Will Do:
- Design, develop, and maintain RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.
- Work with our database systems (MongoDB) to ensure data integrity and performance.
- Write unit and integration tests to ensure the reliability of our services.
- Learn about and contribute to our CI/CD pipeline and cloud deployment processes on AWS.

Who You Are:
- A student pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
- You have a solid foundation in programming and computer science fundamentals.
- You are familiar with backend technologies, including Node.js and a database system.
- You are eager to learn and have a passion for building scalable and reliable software.

Additional Information:
- Duration: 4 months, with an option to transition to a full-time role.
- Mentorship: Direct guidance from senior backend engineers.
- Exposure: Work with microservices architecture and containerized deployments.
- Tools: AWS, Docker, Jenkins, and MongoDB Atlas.
eligibility: B.Tech students familiar with backend tech stack.

title: UX/UI Designer Intern
shortDescription: Design intuitive and beautiful user experiences.
description: Join our design team to create stunning and user-friendly interfaces for our mobile and web applications.
eligibility: Students with a strong portfolio in UI/UX design.

title: DevOps Engineer
shortDescription: Manage and automate our cloud infrastructure.
description: We are looking for a DevOps engineer to help us build and maintain our CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure on AWS.
eligibility: Final year students or recent graduates with relevant experience.
